title: Mood Machine
detail: The mood machine chooses songs, scents and lighting to match the mood of its surroundings
extended_details:
Mood Machine is built using an Arduino and connects to your 
Android phone via Bluetooth. It picks up sound waves from its surroundings with a sound detector and analyzes the mood of the waves using NLP. Based on the input, it chooses and plays a song, creates LED lighting patterns and releases scents to match the mood. (ft taylor swift)
